message: I'll take 90% and leave you 10% - a fair start, wouldn't you say?
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Take this offer while it's still good, every round the deal gets worse for you!
I'm willing to concede some more, but 40/60 is the best I can do.  Every round we delay, the deal gets worse for me. Let's be reasonable and settle this.
